purpose: Robbie-g2 is designed to facilitate the development and deployment of AI agents, providing a framework for experimentation and innovation in agent-based systems.
principle: The agent operates on principles of modularity and adaptability, allowing developers to customize and extend functionalities according to their needs.
reusability: Robbie-g2 promotes code reusability through a modular architecture, enabling components to be reused across different projects and applications.
limitations: As an experimental project in alpha status, Robbie-g2 may lack comprehensive documentation and support, and it may not be fully stable for production use.
name: robbie-g2
